p.k: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky
A group of students searching for their missing archaeology professor find themselves trapped in a mysterious cave system that seems to distort time and space. Sci-fi
81% Theatrical version of Ridley Scott's classic sci-fi thriller, with Harrison Ford as a troubled cop on the trail of fugitive androids. Based on a novel by Philip K. Dick
79% Dazzling sequel to Ridley Scott's sci-fi noir masterpiece, starring Ryan Gosling as an LAPD officer who unearths a long-buried secret
57% Gripping sci-fi action with Jason Statham as Jonas, a diver who must come to the aid of a research team stuck at the bottom of the Pacific, with a huge shark for company
